title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-12.2 - General provider obligations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-12.2 - General provider obligations

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart applies to all services, whether or not they are preexisting
services. However, a limited exception to the applicability of certain sections
of this Subpart has been made in the case of some individuals who are applying
for or receiving supported employment services or respite services (see section
635-12.12
of this

Subpart). (b) Each provider shall
establish fee schedules for services it provides in accordance with section
635-12.9
of this

Subpart. (c) Each provider shall
have written policies/procedures in place to protect the privacy of personal
financial information concerning individuals requesting or receiving services
and other liable parties. (1)

Providers shall
designate staff who are authorized to obtain and access personal financial
information. (2)

Providers may only
disclose personal financial information obtained about the individual and
liable parties to entities as necessary for the individual to obtain and
maintain benefits and to OPWDD. (d) Each provider shall require that the
individual and liable parties comply with the requirements of this

Subpart. Notes
